casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Rene M. RODRIGUEZ, Defendant. State of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Elizabeth A. Colon, Defendant-Respondent. State of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Eric L. Lowers, Defendant-Respondent. State of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Stephen E. Nolan, Defendant-Respondent. State of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Courtney D. Swiderski, Defendant-Respondent. C-1058 September Term 2017
081046 Supreme Court of New Jersey. August 1, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-5077/5078/5146/5147/5160-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the appellant may serve and file a supplemental brief on or before October 1, 2018, and respondents may serve and file a supplemental brief forty-five (45) days after the filing of the appellant's supplemental submission, or, if appellant declines to file such a submission, on or before November 15, 2018.
